casebody.data:
DISCIPLINARY DOCKET

97-2647. Cleveland Bar Assn. v. Shafran.

On December 14,1998, respondent filed a motion for extension of time to respond to this court’s order to show cause entered November 24, 1998. Whereas the Rules of Practice of the Supreme Court of Ohio do not permit a request for extension of time to file a response to a show cause order,

IT IS ORDERED by the court, sua sponte, that the motion for extension of time be, and hereby is, stricken.
